ygData.subject: Re: Bard petition on EQ general forum
ygData.msgSnippet: Yea, I remember when I first heard about him.  I talked to the bard wandering in Qeynos Hills and she mentioned him.  It wasn t until a month ago that I saw
ygData.messageBody:
Yea, I remember when I first heard about him. I talked to the bard
wandering in Qeynos Hills and she mentioned him. It wasn't until a month
ago that I saw guard McCluskey. And no, I will NOT kill him...kind of a
personal thing =)


At 01:58 PM 2/8/00 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
>
>> From: "Stephen E. McCloskey" <s.mccloskey@...>
>
> Everytime I see your name I think West Karana, Guard McCluskey.
> I killed that bastard so much, it's incredible. He's still
> sometimes blue to a L50 after the guard upgrades 8)
>
> Sorry for the OT post, been meaning to say that.
>
> Harmonic.
>
